question: Who is appointed as the new coach of the Indian cricket team?
explanation: Ravi Shastri is appointed as the new coach of the Indian cricket team, while also naming Zaheer Khan as the bowling coach. Shastri, in the process, won five-way battle to grab the post until 2019 Cricket World Cup. Shastri replaced Anil Kumble, who exited after a much publicised difference of opinion with captain Virat Kohli.
